headline: Constellation Energy Weighs AI Power Growth Against Nuclear Policy Risks
summary: Constellation Energy (NasdaqGS:CEG) has closed its acquisition of Calpine, expanding its US power generation portfolio. The company has agreed long term renewable power deals with Microsoft and Meta to supply energy for AI focused data centers. Regulators have extended licenses for several Constellation nuclear plants, while recent government decisions have affected certain tech related nuclear power agreements. Constellation Energy now sits at the center of several big themes for...
